title: US Navy Mission
excerpt: The mission of the United States Navy is to maintain, train and equip combat-ready Naval forces capable of winning wars, deterring aggression and maintaining freedom of the seas.

title: NROTC Mission
excerpt: The purpose of the Naval Reserve Officers Training Corps is to educate and train qualified young men and women for service as commissioned officers in the Navy and Marine Corps.

title: Addressing and Greeting Personnel
expectation: Be familiar with the proper address and greeting for military personnel of any rank.
excerpt: Midshipmen shall address officers by rank and last name (e.g., 'Good morning, Lieutenant Smith') and enlisted personnel by rank and last name; greetings are rendered respectfully and appropriately for the setting.
